description: see http://hl7.org/fhir/json.html#schema for information about the FHIR Json Schemas

allOf.description: The ModuleMetadata structure defines the common metadata elements used by quality improvement artifacts. This information includes descriptive and topical metadata to enable repository searches, as well as governance and evidentiary support information.

url.description: An absolute URL that is used to identify this module when it is referenced. This SHALL be a URL, SHOULD be globally unique, and SHOULD be an address at which this module definition is (or will be) published.

identifier.description: A logical identifier for the module such as the CMS or NQF identifiers for a measure artifact.

version.description: The version of the module, if any. To provide a version consistent with the Decision Support Service specification, use the format Major.Minor.Revision (e.g. 1.0.0). For more information on versioning knowledge modules, refer to the Decision Support Service specification. Note that the version is required for non-experimental published artifact.

name.description: A machine-friendly name for the module. This name should be usable as an identifier for the module by machine processing applications such as code generation.

title.description: A short, descriptive, user-friendly title for the module.

type.description: Identifies the type of knowledge module, such as a rule, library, documentation template, or measure.

experimental.description: Determines whether the module was developed for testing purposes (or education/evaluation/marketing), and is not intended to be used in production environments.

description.description: A free text natural language description of the module from the consumer's perspective.

purpose.description: A brief description of the purpose of the module.

usage.description: A detailed description of how the module is used from a clinical perspective.

publicationDate.description: The date on which the module was published.

lastReviewDate.description: The date on which the module content was last reviewed.

effectivePeriod.description: The period during which the module content is effective.

coverage.description: Specifies various attributes of the patient population for whom and/or environment of care in which, the knowledge module is applicable.

topic.description: Clinical topics related to the content of the module.

contributor.description: A contributor to the content of the module, including authors, editors, reviewers, and endorsers.

publisher.description: The name of the individual or organization that published the module (also known as the steward for the module). This information is required for non-experimental published artifacts.

contact.description: Contacts to assist a user in finding and communicating with the publisher.

copyright.description: A copyright statement relating to the module and/or its contents. Copyright statements are generally legal restrictions on the use and publishing of the module.

relatedResource.description: Related resources such as additional documentation, justification, or bibliographic references.

allOf.description: The ModuleMetadata structure defines the common metadata elements used by quality improvement artifacts. This information includes descriptive and topical metadata to enable repository searches, as well as governance and evidentiary support information.

focus.description: Specifies the focus of the coverage attribute.

value.description: Provides a value for the coverage attribute. Different values are appropriate in different focus areas, as specified in the description of values for focus.

allOf.description: The ModuleMetadata structure defines the common metadata elements used by quality improvement artifacts. This information includes descriptive and topical metadata to enable repository searches, as well as governance and evidentiary support information.

name.description: The name of the individual or organization responsible for the contribution.

contact.description: Contacts to assist a user in finding and communicating with the contributor.

allOf.description: The ModuleMetadata structure defines the common metadata elements used by quality improvement artifacts. This information includes descriptive and topical metadata to enable repository searches, as well as governance and evidentiary support information.

name.description: The name of an individual to contact regarding the contribution.

telecom.description: Contact details for the individual (if a name was provided) or the contributor.

allOf.description: The ModuleMetadata structure defines the common metadata elements used by quality improvement artifacts. This information includes descriptive and topical metadata to enable repository searches, as well as governance and evidentiary support information.

name.description: The name of an individual to contact regarding the module.

telecom.description: Contact details for the individual (if a name was provided) or the publisher.

allOf.description: The ModuleMetadata structure defines the common metadata elements used by quality improvement artifacts. This information includes descriptive and topical metadata to enable repository searches, as well as governance and evidentiary support information.

document.description: The document being referenced, represented as an attachment. This is exclusive with the resource element.

resource.description: The related resource, such as a library, value set, profile, or other module.
